ResearchTabDef.label: Anomalies Expected
ResearchTabDef.generalDescription:
Expansion of void-related technologies by studying unnatural entities.

It uses logic of anomaly research projects.

Progress shown on Anomaly tab.

ResearchProjectDef.label: sleep enhancer serum
ResearchProjectDef.description: Synthesize a serum that stabilizes a person's rest efficiency.

rulesStrings.li: subject_story->stayed awake for long time and was fired due to be too efficient at work
subject_story->could no longer make excuses due to oversleeping.
